name: More Seeds
description:
an Artificial Life ecosystem.

More Seeds is an objective free sandbox game, an AI ant-farm simulation with synthesized soundscape.

Maintain or Disrupt the BALANCE,. . whatever makes you happy ;)

http://jph_wacheski.itch.io/

This project is a sort of remake of Seeds that I created in 2003.

This iteration is a bit more advanced and interesting,. although based around the same ideas of AI systems, and the balancing of complex reactive processes.

Now includes a separate Screen Saver version for passive automated viewing of the system. There is no sound in the Screen Saver, and it ends when the mouse is moved or any key is pressed, as a Screen Saver should.

Tested on Win7, should run on any Windows OS system. The game runs at whatever resolution you launch it from filling the whole screen.

Controls

Left Mouse Button to Cast Seeds.

Number Keys to Choose what is Cast.

Right Mouse Button to Destroy.

Space Bar to reset the System.

.

Additional Controls (not told in game)

P - pause and view Entity Report

M - mute sounds

V - volume (hold key and move mouse vertically)

F - toggle Frames Per Second counter

T - toggle tracers (mushroom trip effect)

C - clear the screen of all lifeForms

ESC - quit and end program

.

Created by jph wacheski in 2014

engine/tool ZGameEditor - sound system SunVox
